data.prayer: Father, help the 17 believers in El Tarf to know your commands and to do them.
data.verse: For Ezra had devoted himself to the study and observance of the Law of the Lord, and to teaching its decrees and laws in Israel.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of El Tarf, Algeria
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Father, please make every disciple be a disciple maker, every home a training center, and every church a church planting movement in the state of El Tarf.
Father, it’s possible most of the 25,580 lost people in  El Tarf, Algeria have never held or opened a Bible. Please change this, Father.
data.verse: Yet faith comes from listening to this Good News—the Good News about Christ.

data.prayer: Father, make bold the prophets in El Tarf, Algeria so that the church can be equipped with truth and insight and a vision of your heart.
data.verse: These are the things which you should do: speak the truth to one another; judge with truth and judgment for peace in your gates.

data.prayer: Spirit, I pray that the Bedouin, Laguat people will come and worship before you, Lord. May they glorify your name for you are great.
Spirit, encourage the church of El Tarf, Algeria that they are blessed with every heavenly blessing.
data.verse: Blessed be the God and Father of our Lord Jesus Christ, who has blessed us with every spiritual blessing in the heavenly places in Christ

data.prayer: Jesus, all authority was given to you, and you commanded all disciples in El Tarf, Algeria to make more disciples, and you promised to be with them. May your power and their obedience make more disciples today.
data.verse: All authority in heaven and on earth has been given to me. Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age.

data.prayer: Spirit, give faith and responsive hearts to the 25,600 citizens of the the state of El Tarf.
data.verse: Seek the Lord while he may be found; call upon him while he is near.
